LanguageData.RPP_Bot_Builder_Basic.label: Builder Bot
LanguageData.RPP_Bot_Builder_Basic.description: A Tier 1 amateur-class unit capable of constructing, deconstructing, repairing, and mining.
LanguageData.RPP_Bot_Builder_Interm.label: Builder Bot
LanguageData.RPP_Bot_Builder_Interm.description: A Tier 2 professional-class unit capable of constructing, deconstructing, repairing, and mining.
LanguageData.RPP_Bot_Builder_Adv.label: Builder Bot
LanguageData.RPP_Bot_Builder_Adv.description: A Tier 3 Master-class unit capable of constructing, deconstructing, repairing, and mining.
LanguageData.RPP_Bot_Crafter_Basic.label: Crafter Bot
LanguageData.RPP_Bot_Crafter_Basic.description: A Tier 1 amateur-class unit capable of smithing, tailoring, and crafting.
LanguageData.RPP_Bot_Crafter_Interm.label: Crafter Bot
LanguageData.RPP_Bot_Crafter_Interm.description: A Tier 2 professional-class unit capable of smithing, tailoring, and crafting.
LanguageData.RPP_Bot_Crafter_Adv.label: Crafter Bot
LanguageData.RPP_Bot_Crafter_Adv.description: A Tier 3 Master-class unit capable of smithing, tailoring, and crafting.
LanguageData.RPP_Bot_ER_Basic.label: ER Bot
LanguageData.RPP_Bot_ER_Basic.description: A Tier 1 amateur-class Emergency Response unit capable of treating patients and fighting fires.
LanguageData.RPP_Bot_ER_Interm.label: ER Bot
LanguageData.RPP_Bot_ER_Interm.description: A Tier 2 professional-class Emergency Response unit capable of treating patients and fighting fires.
LanguageData.RPP_Bot_ER_Adv.label: ER Bot
LanguageData.RPP_Bot_ER_Adv.description: A Tier 3 Master-class Emergency Response unit capable of treating patients and fighting fires.
LanguageData.RPP_Bot_Kitchen_Basic.label: Kitchen Bot

LanguageData.RPP_Bot_Kitchen_Interm.description: A Tier 2 professional-class unit capable of cooking, and tending to plants.
